{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=WNR854 |revision=T |upc=606449047271 |asin=B000FGI970 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WRTM-177GN |fcc_date=06/29/2006 |fcc_id=PY306200049 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F5180;88F5180NB1; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=JS28F640J3C-115 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5DS8M16FS-5T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, CON3 |serial=yes,, 9-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J1 |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIM-205GN |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI (long) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8361P;88W8361P-BEM1; |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8060 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1112 |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1112 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6131;88E6131-LAR1; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.4.27;-vrs1; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=00:18:4D |oui_eth=00:18:4D }} {{TagLine|RangeMax NEXT Wireless Router - Gigabit Edition}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=NETGEAR|model=WNR854T|vs_id=2619}} *OEM: [[Gemtek]] WRTM-177GN (WRTM-177GN_V01) :Additional FCC ID of PY306100037 ? *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/wnr854t ''Netgear WNR854T'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[http://img.tomshardware.com/de/2006/07/26/grundlagen_neuen_802.11n_standards/draft_11n_netgear_wnr854t_board_big.jpg ''Internal shot'' on '''TomsHardware'''] ===Serial=== *'''J1''' is unpopulated 9-pin Serial port :'''CON3''' is 10-pin JTAG port :Main board view, component side: 
J1    [ x ] [RX ] [ x ] [ x ] [TX ]
